wikipedia_page.main: Janusz Jankowski is a doctor, educationalist and scientist of Scottish Polish origin  He is an expert in Social and Healthcare Policy, Academic Management and Global Research and Education Networks  He was formerly in previous senior management roles including Deputy Vice Chancellor of Research and Innovation, Pro Vice Chancellor Research, Vice Dean Research and the Sir James Black Professorship.

response: * Prof Janusz Jankowski, doctor and academic
*Janusz Jankowski – physician, scientist and academic administrator
